title: Unity Small Finance Bank pays Rs 3,800 crore to 8.5 lakh PMC Bank depositors - Economic Times
content: Unity Small Finance Bank pays Rs 3,800 crore to 8.5 lakh PMC Bank depositors  Economic Times
description: “Unity SFB received from DICGC a certified list of erstwhile PMC Bank depositors who are eligible to receive up to Rs5 lakh of their deposits, post banking hours today,” Jaspal Bindra, executive chairman, Centrum Group told ET.
